title: Rumi Bottega Organica
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Mediterranean, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A small 100% health food store, catering and take-out or dine-in restaurant located in Trastevere. Serves mainly vegetarian and vegan food. Uses local and seasonal ingredients, some of which comes from shop's garden. Has a few fish choices. In the shop you can find fruits, vegetables, bread, preserves, cereals, legumes and other products selected according to the criteria of sustainability.
streetAddress: Via di San Francesco a Ripa 133
